items.sentence: Tom has been waiting patiently in the lobby for three hours.
Tom showed Mary a black and white photo of his grandparents.
I suggest that you don\'t tell Tom what you do for a living.
How could Tom and Mary possibly have anything to do with it?
I doubt very seriously Tom will be in Australia next Monday.
They won\'t be happy until they\'ve taken everything we own.
If I\'d been in Tom\'s shoes, I\'d have done the same thing.
I didn\'t have time to do everything that needed to be done.
How long were you planning on keeping this a secret from me?
Tom will be driving through Boston on his way to visit Mary.
